item.title: Hello
item.description: This is the inaugural post of the new version of my personal website powered by Hugo and Go. The plan for this website is to become public record of projects I’m working on, a knowledge base of technical topics and my way to get into writing. Writing is Thinking I read recently, and I totally agree. Engligh is also not my native language so this blog will definetly help me to improve my english skills as well.
